document.full_text: kraft foods inc  reported a better-than-expected first-quarter profit on thursday, helped by price increases and cost cuts, but it tempered its full-year outlook after losing the contract to sell starbucks coffee in grocery stores.
document.title: higher prices help kraft beat profit forecasts
lines_and_colors: kraft foods inc  reported a better-than-expected first-quarter profit on thursday, helped by price increases and cost cuts, but it tempered its full-year outlook after losing the contract to sell starbucks coffee in grocery stores.
